pages.text: am wid imalen ar tidep ar Oebbi, ur aS pcaraken. Win ipcaraken i Oebbi, amzun i$li d seg igenni, u iccelqef it ufoux, ne$ inheo it wavu, s amekkan lqayen
Akka. Win ippauzzun isekkiren n Oebbi, ihi, d aeezzeb n wulawen
I kunwi degs aba$uo ar lajel ipwassnen, sinna, ieegga nnsen ar Uxxam aqdim
I yal lois, Nefka asekkir, iwakken a d smektin ism n Oebbi, $ef ubhim n lmal is iten N$at. Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen. Ihi, anzet aS. Becceo itubiyen
wid iwumi ppergigin wulawen nnsen mara d mmektin Oebbi, wid iuebboen i wayen iten iu$en, wid ipeallan u pseddiqen seg wayen is iten N$at

Lmal iqebbwan, Nerra yawen ten, seg isekkiren n Oebbi. Degsen lfayda i kunwi. Bedret fellasen isem n Oebbi, mara d rsen. Mi $lin $ef ibeodiyen nnsen, eccet segsen, cceccet aaiiao, aeawali. Akka ay d Nenub fellawen yissen, amar a ppesnemmrem

Ur ippawev ar Oebbi uksum nnsen, ne$ idamen nnsen, d awez$i. Ara T iawven, d aeezzeb nnwen. Am akka, Inub fellawen yissen, iwakken ad aS tgem ccan i Oebbi, ilmend n nnhaya nnwen s$uoeS. Becceo wid imaanen
Ih, Oebbi Ipfukku wid iumnen. Ih, Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara yal lxayen ajehli
